name: General Repairs
description: Drywall, doors, windows, trim, and other small repair items.

name: Plumbing
description: Faucets, toilets, drains, disposals, and related plumbing tasks.

name: Electrical
description: Light fixtures, fans, switches, outlets, and smart devices.

name: Carpentry & Furniture
description: Furniture assembly, trim work, handrails, and light carpentry.

name: Painting & Finishes
description: Interior/exterior painting, staining, and finishing work.

name: Outdoor & Seasonal
description: Gutters, pressure washing, sheds, mailboxes, and seasonal jobs.

name: Mounting & Installs
description: TVs, mirrors, curtain rods, blinds, grab bars, and similar installs.

name: Maintenance & Small Jobs
description: Dryer vents, filters, weatherstripping, small exterior fixes.

name: Specialty & Future Expansion
description: Complex, custom, or multi-day projects not covered elsewhere.
